acid.name: Acid
acid.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
acid.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Def by 1.

amnesia.name: Amnesia
amnesia.description: Raises the user's Special Defense by 2 stages.
amnesia.shortDescription: Raises the user's Sp. Def by 2.

aurorabeam.name: Aurora Beam
aurorabeam.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
aurorabeam.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

bide.name: Bide
bide.description: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost to attacks during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer active, the user attacks a random opposing Pokemon instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not check accuracy and does not ignore type immunity.
bide.shortDescription: Waits 2 turns; deals double the damage taken.

bind.name: Bind
bind.description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
bind.shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

bite.name: Bite
bite.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
bite.shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Snow, this move does not check accuracy.
blizzard.shortDescription: 10% chance to freeze foe(s). Can't miss in Snow.

bubble.name: Bubble
bubble.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubble.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

bubblebeam.name: Bubble Beam
bubblebeam.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
bubblebeam.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

clamp.name: Clamp
clamp.description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
clamp.shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

constrict.name: Constrict
constrict.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
constrict.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

conversion.name: Conversion
conversion.description: The user's type changes to match the original type of the move in its first move slot. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if the type is one of the user's current types.
conversion.shortDescription: Changes user's type to match its first move.

counter.name: Counter
counter.description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn.
counter.shortDescription: If hit by physical attack, returns double damage.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move was a Max or G-Max Move.
disable.shortDescription: For 4 turns, disables the target's last move used.

dizzypunch.name: Dizzy Punch
dizzypunch.description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

doubleedge.name: Double-Edge
doubleedge.description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

dragonrage.name: Dragon Rage
dragonrage.description: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.
dragonrage.shortDescription: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.description: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
explosion.shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

fireblast.name: Fire Blast
fireblast.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

firespin.name: Fire Spin
firespin.description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
firespin.shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
fly.shortDescription: Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.

focusenergy.name: Focus Energy
focusenergy.description: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
focusenergy.shortDescription: Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land, this move raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella, this move will only raise the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage, even if the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land.
growth.shortDescription: Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.

gust.name: Gust
gust.description: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
gust.shortDescription: Power doubles during Bounce, Fly, and Sky Drop.

haze.name: Haze
haze.description: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.

highjumpkick.name: High Jump Kick
highjumpkick.description: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
highjumpkick.shortDescription: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

jumpkick.name: Jump Kick
jumpkick.description: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
jumpkick.shortDescription: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

karatechop.name: Karate Chop
karatechop.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

leechseed.name: Leech Seed
leechseed.description: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Mortal Spin or Rapid Spin successfully, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.
leechseed.shortDescription: 1/8 of target's HP is restored to user every turn.

lightscreen.name: Light Screen
lightscreen.description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
lightscreen.shortDescription: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.description: While the user remains active, this move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Assist, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Tera Starstorm, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
mimic.shortDescription: The last move the target used replaces this one.

mirrormove.name: Mirror Move
mirrormove.description: The user uses the last move used by the target. The copied move is used against that target, if possible. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the last move used cannot be copied by this move.
mirrormove.shortDescription: User uses the target's last used move against it.

mist.name: Mist
mist.description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members are protected from having their stat stages lowered by other Pokemon. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
mist.shortDescription: For 5 turns, protects user's party from stat drops.

nightshade.name: Night Shade
nightshade.description: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
nightshade.shortDescription: Does damage equal to the user's level.

petaldance.name: Petal Dance
petaldance.description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
petaldance.shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

poisonsting.name: Poison Sting
poisonsting.description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

psychic.name: psychic
psychic.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
psychic.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

psywave.name: Psywave
psywave.description: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
psywave.shortDescription: Random damage equal to 0.5x-1.5x user's level.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: Once this move is successfully used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.
rage.shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack by 1 if hit during use.

razorleaf.name: Razor Leaf
razorleaf.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
razorleaf.shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

razorwind.name: Razor Wind
razorwind.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
razorwind.shortDescription: Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
recover.shortDescription: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
reflect.shortDescription: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

rest.name: Rest
rest.description: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
rest.shortDescription: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

roar.name: Roar
roar.description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
roar.shortDescription: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

rockslide.name: Rock Slide
rockslide.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rockslide.shortDescription: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

sandattack.name: Sand Attack
sandattack.description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

seismictoss.name: Seismic Toss
seismictoss.description: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
seismictoss.shortDescription: Does damage equal to the user's level.

selfdestruct.name: Self-Destruct
selfdestruct.description: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
selfdestruct.shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

skullbash.name: Skull Bash
skullbash.description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skullbash.shortDescription: Raises user's Defense by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

skyattack.name: Sky Attack
skyattack.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
skyattack.shortDescription: Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.

slash.name: Slash
slash.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

sludge.name: Sludge
sludge.description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

solarbeam.name: Solar Beam
solarbeam.description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
solarbeam.shortDescription: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

sonicboom.name: Sonic Boom
sonicboom.description: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target.

softboiled.name: Soft-Boiled
softboiled.description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
softboiled.shortDescription: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.description: Deals typeless damage to a random opposing Pokemon. If this move was successful, the user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and the Rock Head Ability does not prevent this. This move is automatically used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.
struggle.shortDescription: User loses 1/4 of its max HP.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.description: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
substitute.shortDescription: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

superfang.name: Super Fang
superfang.description: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
superfang.shortDescription: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
thrash.shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
thunder.shortDescription: 30% chance to paralyze. Can't miss in rain.

triattack.name: Tri Attack
triattack.description: Has a 20% chance to either burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
triattack.shortDescription: 20% chance to paralyze or burn or freeze target.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
whirlwind.shortDescription: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

wrap.name: Wrap
wrap.description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
wrap.shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

lowkick.name: Low Kick
lowkick.description: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
lowkick.shortDescription: More power the heavier the target.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.description: A random move is selected for use, other than After You, Apple Acid, Armor Cannon, Assist, Astral Barrage, Aura Wheel, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Body Press, Branch Poke, Breaking Swipe, Celebrate, Chatter, Chilling Water, Chilly Reception, Clangorous Soul, Collision Course, Combat Torque, Comeuppance, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Decorate, Destiny Bond, Detect, Diamond Storm, Doodle, Double Iron Bash, Double Shock, Dragon Ascent, Dragon Energy, Drum Beating, Dynamax Cannon, Electro Drift, Endure, Eternabeam, False Surrender, Feint, Fiery Wrath, Fillet Away, Fleur Cannon, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Freeze Shock, Freezing Glare, Glacial Lance, Grav Apple, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Hyper Drill, Hyperspace Fury, Hyperspace Hole, Ice Burn, Instruct, Jet Punch, Jungle Healing, King's Shield, Life Dew, Light of Ruin, Magical Torque, Make It Rain, Mat Block, Me First, Meteor Assault, Metronome, Mimic, Mind Blown, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Moongeist Beam, Nature Power, Nature's Madness, Noxious Torque, Obstruct, Order Up, Origin Pulse, Overdrive, Photon Geyser, Plasma Fists, Population Bomb, Pounce, Power Shift, Precipice Blades, Protect, Pyro Ball, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Fist, Rage Powder, Raging Bull, Raging Fury, Relic Song, Revival Blessing, Ruination, Salt Cure, Secret Sword, Shed Tail, Shell Trap, Silk Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snap Trap, Snarl, Snatch, Snore, Snowscape, Spectral Thief, Spicy Extract, Spiky Shield, Spirit Break, Spotlight, Springtide Storm, Steam Eruption, Steel Beam, Strange Steam, Struggle, Sunsteel Strike, Surging Strikes, Switcheroo, Techno Blast, Tera Starstorm, Thief, Thousand Arrows, Thousand Waves, Thunder Cage, Thunderous Kick, Tidy Up, Trailblaze, Transform, Trick, Twin Beam, V-create, Wicked Blow, Wicked Torque, or Wide Guard.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.description: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.
toxic.shortDescription: Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, gender, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP, with a maximum of 5 PP each. The user can no longer change formes if it would have the ability to do so. This move fails if it hits a substitute, if either the user or the target is already transformed, or if either is behind an Illusion.
transform.shortDescription: Copies target's stats, moves, types, and Ability.

absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
absorb.shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

megadrain.shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

surf.shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dive.

waterfall.name: Waterfall

waterfall.shortDescription: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

dreameater.name: Dream Eater
dreameater.description: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
dreameater.shortDescription: User gains 1/2 HP inflicted. Sleeping target only.

minimize.name: Minimize
minimize.description: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, Heat Crash, Heavy Slam, Malicious Moonsault, Steamroller, and Stomp will not check accuracy and have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.

acidarmor.description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

leechlife.shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

screech.description: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.

sing.name: Sing
sing.description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

sleeppowder.description: Causes the target to fall asleep.

stringshot.description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

supersonic.description: Causes the target to become confused.
supersonic.shortDescription: Causes the target to become confused.

swordsdance.description: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

thunderwave.name: Thunder Wave
thunderwave.description: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

boneclub.name: Bone Club
boneclub.description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
boneclub.shortDescription: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

cometpunch.name: Comet Punch
cometpunch.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

doubleslap.name: Double Slap
doubleslap.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

hyperfang.description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
hyperfang.shortDescription: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

meditate.name: Meditate
meditate.description: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

rollingkick.name: Rolling Kick
rollingkick.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
rollingkick.shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

sharpen.name: Sharpen
sharpen.description: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.

spikecannon.name: Spike Cannon
spikecannon.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.

twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.description: Hits twice, with each hit having a 20% chance to poison the target. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
twineedle.shortDescription: Hits 2 times. Each hit has 20% chance to poison.

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

kinesis.name: Kinesis
kinesis.description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

lovelykiss.name: Lovely Kiss
lovelykiss.description: Causes the target to fall asleep.
lovelykiss.shortDescription: Causes the target to fall asleep.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

bodyslam.name: Body Slam
bodyslam.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

confuseray.name: Confuse Ray
confuseray.description: Causes the target to become confused.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

defensecurl.name: Defense Curl
defensecurl.description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. As long as the user remains active, the power of the user's Ice Ball and Rollout will be doubled (this effect is not stackable).

doublekick.name: Double Kick
doublekick.description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

doubleteam.name: Double Team
doubleteam.description: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
earthquake.shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dig.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

firepunch.name: Fire Punch
firepunch.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
fissure.shortDescription: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

furyattack.name: Fury Attack
furyattack.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

furyswipes.name: Fury Swipes
furyswipes.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
guillotine.shortDescription: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

harden.name: Harden
harden.description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

headbutt.name: Headbutt
headbutt.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
headbutt.shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

horndrill.name: Horn Drill
horndrill.description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
horndrill.shortDescription: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

hyperbeam.name: Hyper Beam
hyperbeam.description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

icepunch.name: Ice Punch
icepunch.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

leer.name: Leer
leer.description: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

psybeam.name: Psybeam
psybeam.description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
stomp.shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

swift.name: Swift
swift.description: This move does not check accuracy.
swift.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

tailwhip.name: Tail Whip
tailwhip.description: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

takedown.name: Take Down
takedown.description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

thunderpunch.name: Thunder Punch
thunderpunch.description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

thundershock.name: Thunder Shock
thundershock.description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

withdraw.name: Withdraw
withdraw.description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.

aeroblast.name: Aeroblast
aeroblast.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

beatup.name: Beat Up
beatup.description: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a non-volatile status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.
beatup.shortDescription: All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.

bellydrum.name: Belly Drum
bellydrum.description: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.
bellydrum.shortDescription: User loses 50% max HP. Maximizes Attack.

crosschop.name: Cross Chop
crosschop.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.
curse.shortDescription: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.

detect.name: Detect
detect.description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
detect.shortDescription: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

encore.name: Encore
encore.description: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Assist, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Encore, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
encore.shortDescription: Target repeats its last move for its next 3 turns.

endure.name: Endure
endure.description: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
endure.shortDescription: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.

flail.name: Flail
flail.description: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
flail.shortDescription: More power the less HP the user has left.

foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.
foresight.shortDescription: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

frustration.name: Frustration
frustration.description: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

healbell.name: Heal Bell
healbell.description: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
healbell.shortDescription: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

lockon.name: Lock-On
lockon.description: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
lockon.shortDescription: User's next move will not miss the target.

meanlook.name: Mean Look
meanlook.description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
meanlook.shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

mindreader.name: Mind Reader
mindreader.description: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
mindreader.shortDescription: User's next move will not miss the target.

mirrorcoat.name: Mirror Coat
mirrorcoat.description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.
mirrorcoat.shortDescription: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
moonlight.shortDescription: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

morningsun.name: Morning Sun
morningsun.description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
morningsun.shortDescription: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.description: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
nightmare.shortDescription: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
outrage.shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

painsplit.name: Pain Split
painsplit.description: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
painsplit.shortDescription: Shares HP of user and target equally.

perishsong.name: Perish Song
perishsong.description: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
perishsong.shortDescription: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.

protect.name: Protect
protect.description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
protect.shortDescription: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.description: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
pursuit.shortDescription: If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.

return.name: Return
return.description: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.description: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
reversal.shortDescription: More power the less HP the user has left.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have non-volatile status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
safeguard.shortDescription: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.description: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Dark Void, Hyperspace Fury, Magical Torque, Noxious Torque, Revival Blessing, Sketch, Struggle, Tera Starstorm, Wicked Torque, or any move the user knows.
sketch.shortDescription: Permanently copies the last move target used.

sleeptalk.name: Sleep Talk
sleeptalk.description: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, Wicked Torque, or any two-turn move.
sleeptalk.shortDescription: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

spiderweb.name: Spider Web
spiderweb.description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
spiderweb.shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
spikes.shortDescription: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.description: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.
swagger.shortDescription: Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
synthesis.shortDescription: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

thief.name: Thief
thief.description: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
thief.shortDescription: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

triplekick.name: Triple Kick
triplekick.description: Hits three times. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit three times.
triplekick.shortDescription: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

ancientpower.name: Ancient Power
ancientpower.description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ancientpower.shortDescription: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crunch.shortDescription: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

feintattack.name: Feint Attack
feintattack.description: This move does not check accuracy.
feintattack.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

furycutter.name: Fury Cutter
furycutter.description: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.
furycutter.shortDescription: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.

gigadrain.name: Giga Drain
gigadrain.description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
gigadrain.shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

hiddenpower.name: Hidden Power
hiddenpower.description: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
hiddenpower.shortDescription: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.

rocksmash.name: Rock Smash
rocksmash.description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
rocksmash.shortDescription: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

spite.name: Spite
spite.description: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.
spite.shortDescription: Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 4.

zapcannon.name: Zap Cannon
zapcannon.description: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

bonerush.name: Bone Rush
bonerush.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

cottonspore.name: Cotton Spore
cottonspore.description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

futuresight.name: Future Sight
futuresight.description: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
futuresight.shortDescription: Hits two turns after being used.

psychup.name: Psych Up
psychup.description: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
psychup.shortDescription: Copies the target's current stat stages.

rapidspin.name: Rapid Spin
rapidspin.description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
rapidspin.shortDescription: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.

scaryface.name: Scary Face
scaryface.description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.

snore.name: Snore
snore.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Fails if the user is not asleep.
snore.shortDescription: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
whirlpool.shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

charm.name: Charm
charm.description: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

sweetkiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweetkiss.description: Causes the target to become confused.
sweetkiss.shortDescription: Causes the target to become confused.

sweetscent.name: Sweet Scent
sweetscent.description: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 2 stages.

destinybond.name: Destiny Bond
destinybond.description: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability.
destinybond.shortDescription: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.

magnitude.name: Magnitude
magnitude.description: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
magnitude.shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.

milkdrink.name: Milk Drink
milkdrink.description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
milkdrink.shortDescription: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

octazooka.name: Octazooka
octazooka.description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
octazooka.shortDescription: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

vitalthrow.name: Vital Throw
vitalthrow.description: This move does not check accuracy.
vitalthrow.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy. Goes last.

attract.name: Attract
attract.description: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
attract.shortDescription: A target of the opposite gender gets infatuated.

batonpass.name: Baton Pass
batonpass.description: The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party. The selected Pokemon has the user's stat stage changes, confusion, and certain move effects transferred to it.
batonpass.shortDescription: User switches, passing stat changes and more.

conversion2.name: Conversion 2
conversion2.description: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used by the target, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.
conversion2.shortDescription: Changes user's type to resist target's last move.

dragonbreath.name: Dragon Breath
dragonbreath.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

dynamicpunch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamicpunch.description: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

falseswipe.name: False Swipe
falseswipe.description: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
falseswipe.shortDescription: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

flamewheel.name: Flame Wheel
flamewheel.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
flamewheel.shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

icywind.name: Icy Wind
icywind.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
icywind.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

irontail.name: Iron Tail
irontail.description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
irontail.shortDescription: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

metalclaw.name: Metal Claw
metalclaw.description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
metalclaw.shortDescription: 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

mudslap.name: Mud-Slap
mudslap.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mudslap.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

powdersnow.name: Powder Snow
powdersnow.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

present.name: Present
present.description: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
present.shortDescription: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.

raindance.name: Rain Dance
raindance.description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
raindance.shortDescription: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.description: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
rollout.shortDescription: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

sacredfire.name: Sacred Fire
sacredfire.description: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
sacredfire.shortDescription: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
sandstorm.shortDescription: For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages. Rock: 1.5x SpD.

shadowball.name: Shadow Ball
shadowball.description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shadowball.shortDescription: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

sludgebomb.name: Sludge Bomb
sludgebomb.description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

spark.name: Spark
spark.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

steelwing.name: Steel Wing
steelwing.description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
steelwing.shortDescription: 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

sunnyday.name: Sunny Day
sunnyday.description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
sunnyday.shortDescription: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

twister.name: Twister
twister.description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
twister.shortDescription: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

assist.name: Assist
assist.description: A random move among those known by the user's party members is selected for use. Does not select Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Bounce, Celebrate, Chatter, Circle Throw, Combat Torque, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dig, Dive, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Fly, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Phantom Force, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shadow Force, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sky Drop, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Tera Starstorm, Thief, Transform, Trick, Whirlwind, or Wicked Torque.
assist.shortDescription: Uses a random move known by a team member.

astonish.name: Astonish
astonish.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
astonish.shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

brickbreak.name: Brick Break
brickbreak.description: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
brickbreak.shortDescription: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Raises the user's Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's next Electric-type attack will have its power doubled; the effect ends when the user is no longer active, or after the user attempts to use any Electric-type move besides Charge, even if it is not successful.
charge.shortDescription: +1 SpD, user's next Electric move 2x power.

covet.name: Covet
covet.description: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
covet.shortDescription: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

dive.name: Dive
dive.description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

doomdesire.name: Doom Desire
doomdesire.description: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.
doomdesire.shortDescription: Hits two turns after being used.

extrasensory.name: Extrasensory
extrasensory.description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
extrasensory.shortDescription: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

fakeout.name: Fake Out
fakeout.description: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
fakeout.shortDescription: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

followme.name: Follow Me
followme.description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
followme.shortDescription: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

leafblade.name: Leaf Blade
leafblade.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

memento.name: Memento
memento.description: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints unless this move misses or there is no target. Fails entirely if this move hits a substitute, but does not fail if the target's stats cannot be changed.
memento.shortDescription: Lowers target's Attack, Sp. Atk by 2. User faints.

naturepower.name: Nature Power
naturepower.description: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Thunderbolt during Electric Terrain, Moonblast during Misty Terrain, Energy Ball during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic during Psychic Terrain.
naturepower.shortDescription: Attack depends on terrain (default Tri Attack).

needlearm.name: Needle Arm
needlearm.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
needlearm.shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

odorsleuth.name: Odor Sleuth
odorsleuth.description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.
odorsleuth.shortDescription: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

overheat.name: Overheat
overheat.description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
overheat.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

stockpile.name: Stockpile
stockpile.description: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3. The user's Stockpile count is reset to 0 when it is no longer active.
stockpile.shortDescription: Raises user's Defense, Sp. Def by 1. Max 3 uses.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
taunt.shortDescription: Target can't use status moves its next 3 turns.

teeterdance.name: Teeter Dance
teeterdance.description: Causes the target to become confused.

tickle.name: Tickle
tickle.description: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
tickle.shortDescription: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by 1.

uproar.name: Uproar
uproar.description: The user spends three turns locked into this move. This move targets an opponent at random on each turn. On the first of the three turns, all sleeping active Pokemon wake up. During the three turns, no active Pokemon can fall asleep by any means, and Pokemon switched in during the effect do not wake up. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target during one of the turns, the effect ends.
uproar.shortDescription: Lasts 3 turns. Active Pokemon cannot fall asleep.

volttackle.name: Volt Tackle
volttackle.description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
volttackle.shortDescription: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to paralyze target.

weatherball.name: Weather Ball
weatherball.description: Power doubles if a weather condition other than Delta Stream is active, and this move's type changes to match. Ice type during Snow, Water type during Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Desolate Land or Sunny Day. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and uses Weather Ball during Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Desolate Land, or Sunny Day, this move remains Normal type and does not double in power.
weatherball.shortDescription: Power doubles and type varies in each weather.

aromatherapy.name: Aromatherapy
aromatherapy.description: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Sap Sipper Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
aromatherapy.shortDescription: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

bulletseed.name: Bullet Seed
bulletseed.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

camouflage.name: Camouflage
camouflage.description: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, Electric type during Electric Terrain, Fairy type during Misty Terrain, Grass type during Grassy Terrain, and Psychic type during Psychic Terrain. Fails if the user's type cannot be changed or if the user is already purely that type.
camouflage.shortDescription: Changes user's type by terrain (default Normal).

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.description: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
endeavor.shortDescription: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

focuspunch.name: Focus Punch
focuspunch.description: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.
focuspunch.shortDescription: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

iciclespear.name: Icicle Spear
iciclespear.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

imprison.name: Imprison
imprison.description: The user prevents all opposing Pokemon from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active.
imprison.shortDescription: No foe can use any move known by the user.

ingrain.name: Ingrain
ingrain.description: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.
ingrain.shortDescription: Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.

knockoff.name: Knock Off
knockoff.description: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
knockoff.shortDescription: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

magiccoat.name: Magic Coat
magiccoat.description: Until the end of the turn, the user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. Moves reflected in this way are unable to be reflected again by this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes can only be reflected once per side, by the leftmost Pokemon under this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. The Lightning Rod and Storm Drain Abilities redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.

mudsport.name: Mud Sport
mudsport.description: For 5 turns, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active.
mudsport.shortDescription: For 5 turns, Electric-type attacks have 1/3 power.

recycle.name: Recycle
recycle.description: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Corrosive Gas, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
recycle.shortDescription: Restores the item the user last used.

rockblast.name: Rock Blast
rockblast.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

roleplay.name: Role Play
roleplay.description: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Flower Gift, Forecast, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
roleplay.shortDescription: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

sandtomb.name: Sand Tomb
sandtomb.description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
sandtomb.shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

secretpower.name: Secret Power
secretpower.description: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain.
secretpower.shortDescription: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

skillswap.name: Skill Swap
skillswap.description: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
skillswap.shortDescription: The user and the target trade Abilities.

snatch.name: Snatch
snatch.description: If another Pokemon uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use one of those moves this turn, the applicable moves are all stolen by the first Pokemon in turn order that used this move this turn. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
snatch.shortDescription: User steals certain support moves to use itself.

tailglow.name: Tail Glow
tailglow.description: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.
tailglow.shortDescription: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

torment.name: Torment
torment.description: Prevents the target from selecting the same move for use two turns in a row. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
torment.shortDescription: Target can't select the same move twice in a row.

trick.name: Trick
trick.description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
trick.shortDescription: User switches its held item with the target's.

watersport.name: Water Sport
watersport.description: For 5 turns, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active.
watersport.shortDescription: For 5 turns, Fire-type attacks have 1/3 power.

wish.name: Wish
wish.description: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of the user's maximum HP restored to it, rounded down. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position.
wish.shortDescription: Next turn, 50% of the user's max HP is restored.

yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.description: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a non-volatile status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still active, does not have a non-volatile status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep.
