If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.
yawn.shortDescription: Puts the target to sleep after 1 turn.

aircutter.name: Air Cutter
aircutter.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
aircutter.shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

block.name: Block
block.description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
block.shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

grasswhistle.name: Grass Whistle
grasswhistle.description: Causes the target to fall asleep.
grasswhistle.shortDescription: Causes the target to fall asleep.

heatwave.name: Heat Wave
heatwave.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

hypervoice.name: Hyper Voice
hypervoice.shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

metalsound.name: Metal Sound
metalsound.description: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
metalsound.shortDescription: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

meteormash.name: Meteor Mash
meteormash.description: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
meteormash.shortDescription: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

muddywater.name: Muddy Water
muddywater.description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
muddywater.shortDescription: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

poisonfang.name: Poison Fang
poisonfang.description: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonfang.shortDescription: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

rocktomb.name: Rock Tomb
rocktomb.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
rocktomb.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

smellingsalts.name: Smelling Salts
smellingsalts.description: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of paralysis.
smellingsalts.shortDescription: Power doubles if target is paralyzed, and cures it.

sheercold.name: Sheer Cold
sheercold.description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + X)%, where X is 30 if the user is an Ice type and 20 otherwise, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Ice-type Pokemon and Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
sheercold.shortDescription: OHKOs non-Ice targets. Fails if user's lower level.

howl.name: Howl
howl.description: Raises the Attack of the user and all allies 1 stage.
howl.shortDescription: Raises the user's and ally's Attack by 1.

iceball.name: Ice Ball
iceball.description: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
iceball.shortDescription: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

psychoboost.name: Psycho Boost
psychoboost.description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
psychoboost.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.description: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.
refresh.shortDescription: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

signalbeam.name: Signal Beam
signalbeam.description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

silverwind.name: Silver Wind
silverwind.description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
silverwind.shortDescription: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

skyuppercut.name: Sky Uppercut
skyuppercut.description: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
skyuppercut.shortDescription: Can hit Pokemon using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

swallow.name: Swallow
swallow.description: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded half down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
swallow.shortDescription: Heals the user based on uses of Stockpile.

grudge.name: Grudge
grudge.description: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP.
grudge.shortDescription: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.

hail.name: Hail
hail.description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.

lusterpurge.name: Luster Purge
lusterpurge.description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
lusterpurge.shortDescription: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

mistball.name: Mist Ball
mistball.description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mistball.shortDescription: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
revenge.shortDescription: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

slackoff.name: Slack Off
slackoff.description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
slackoff.shortDescription: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

aerialace.name: Aerial Ace
aerialace.description: This move does not check accuracy.
aerialace.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

armthrust.name: Arm Thrust
armthrust.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

blastburn.name: Blast Burn
blastburn.description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

blazekick.name: Blaze Kick
blazekick.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
blazekick.shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to burn.

bulkup.name: Bulk Up
bulkup.description: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
bulkup.shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

calmmind.name: Calm Mind
calmmind.description: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
calmmind.shortDescription: Raises the user's Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by 1.

cosmicpower.name: Cosmic Power
cosmicpower.description: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
cosmicpower.shortDescription: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

crushclaw.name: Crush Claw
crushclaw.description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
crushclaw.shortDescription: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

dragondance.name: Dragon Dance
dragondance.description: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
dragondance.shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.description: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
eruption.shortDescription: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

facade.name: Facade
facade.description: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
facade.shortDescription: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

faketears.name: Fake Tears
faketears.description: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
faketears.shortDescription: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

featherdance.name: Feather Dance
featherdance.description: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.

flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.description: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.
flatter.shortDescription: Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.

frenzyplant.name: Frenzy Plant
frenzyplant.description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

helpinghand.name: Helping Hand
helpinghand.description: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
helpinghand.shortDescription: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

hydrocannon.name: Hydro Cannon
hydrocannon.description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

irondefense.name: Iron Defense
irondefense.description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

magicalleaf.name: Magical Leaf
magicalleaf.description: This move does not check accuracy.
magicalleaf.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

mudshot.name: Mud Shot
mudshot.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
mudshot.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

poisontail.name: Poison Tail
poisontail.description: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
poisontail.shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

shadowpunch.name: Shadow Punch
shadowpunch.description: This move does not check accuracy.
shadowpunch.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

shockwave.name: Shock Wave
shockwave.description: This move does not check accuracy.
shockwave.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

spitup.name: Spit Up
spitup.description: Power is equal to 100 times the user's Stockpile count. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Whether or not this move is successful, the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
spitup.shortDescription: More power with more uses of Stockpile.

superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.description: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
superpower.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

waterpulse.name: Water Pulse
waterpulse.description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

waterspout.name: Water Spout
waterspout.description: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
waterspout.shortDescription: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

acupressure.name: Acupressure
acupressure.description: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an adjacent ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if used on an ally with a substitute.
acupressure.shortDescription: Raises a random stat of the user or an ally by 2.

aquaring.name: Aqua Ring
aquaring.description: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn while it remains active. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will receive the healing effect.
aquaring.shortDescription: User recovers 1/16 max HP per turn.

bravebird.name: Brave Bird
bravebird.description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

chatter.name: Chatter
chatter.description: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

crushgrip.name: Crush Grip
crushgrip.description: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
crushgrip.shortDescription: More power the more HP the target has left.

defog.name: Defog
defog.description: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness. If there is a terrain active and this move is successful, the terrain will be cleared.
defog.shortDescription: -1 evasion; clears terrain and hazards on both sides.

drainpunch.name: Drain Punch
drainpunch.description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
drainpunch.shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

embargo.name: Embargo
embargo.description: For 5 turns, the target's held item has no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by the target. Items thrown at the target with Fling will still activate for it. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.
embargo.shortDescription: For 5 turns, the target's item has no effect.

feint.name: Feint
feint.description: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
feint.shortDescription: Nullifies Detect, Protect, and Quick/Wide Guard.

flareblitz.name: Flare Blitz
flareblitz.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
flareblitz.shortDescription: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.description: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.

healblock.name: Heal Block
healblock.description: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
healblock.shortDescription: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

healingwish.name: Healing Wish
healingwish.description: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP is fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets either of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
healingwish.shortDescription: User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.

lastresort.name: Last Resort
lastresort.description: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.
lastresort.shortDescription: Fails unless each known move has been used.

luckychant.name: Lucky Chant
luckychant.description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot be struck by a critical hit. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
luckychant.shortDescription: For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.

lunardance.name: Lunar Dance
lunardance.description: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or PP, or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP and PP are fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets any of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
lunardance.shortDescription: User faints. Next hurt Pkmn is cured, max HP/PP.

magmastorm.name: Magma Storm
magmastorm.description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
magmastorm.shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

magnetrise.name: Magnet Rise
magnetrise.description: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
magnetrise.shortDescription: For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.

mefirst.name: Me First
mefirst.description: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Beak Blast, Belch, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Comeuppance, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Magical Torque, Me First, Metal Burst, Mirror Coat, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Struggle, Thief, or Wicked Torque. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.
mefirst.shortDescription: Copies a foe at 1.5x power. User must be faster.

metalburst.name: Metal Burst
metalburst.description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
metalburst.shortDescription: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

miracleeye.name: Miracle Eye
miracleeye.description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Odor Sleuth.

payback.name: Payback
payback.description: Power doubles if the user moves after the target this turn, including actions taken through Instruct or the Dancer Ability. Switching in does not count as an action.
payback.shortDescription: Power doubles if the user moves after the target.

powertrick.name: Power Trick
powertrick.description: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
powertrick.shortDescription: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

stealthrock.name: Stealth Rock
stealthrock.description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stealthrock.shortDescription: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

suckerpunch.name: Sucker Punch
suckerpunch.description: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
suckerpunch.shortDescription: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
switcheroo.shortDescription: User switches its held item with the target's.

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.description: For 4 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
tailwind.shortDescription: For 4 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

toxicspikes.name: Toxic Spikes
toxicspikes.description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, poisoning each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to two times before failing. Opposing Pokemon become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the opposing party from being poisoned on switch-in, but a substitute does not.
toxicspikes.shortDescription: Poisons grounded foes on switch-in. Max 2 layers.

trickroom.name: Trick Room
trickroom.description: For 5 turns, the Speed of every Pokemon is recalculated for the purposes of determining turn order. During the effect, each Pokemon's Speed is considered to be (10000 - its normal Speed), and if this value is greater than 8191, 8192 is subtracted from it. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
trickroom.shortDescription: Goes last. For 5 turns, turn order is reversed.

woodhammer.name: Wood Hammer
woodhammer.description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

worryseed.name: Worry Seed
worryseed.description: Causes the target's Ability to become Insomnia. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Insomnia, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.

wringout.name: Wring Out
wringout.description: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
wringout.shortDescription: More power the more HP the target has left.

airslash.name: Air Slash
airslash.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
airslash.shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

assurance.name: Assurance
assurance.description: Power doubles if the target has already taken damage this turn, other than direct damage from Belly Drum, confusion, Curse, or Pain Split.
assurance.shortDescription: Power doubles if target was damaged this turn.

aurasphere.name: Aura Sphere
aurasphere.description: This move does not check accuracy.
aurasphere.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

bugbuzz.name: Bug Buzz
bugbuzz.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
bugbuzz.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.description: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Circle Throw, Combat Torque, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Dynamax Cannon, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Tera Starstorm, Thief, Transform, Trick, Whirlwind, or Wicked Torque.
copycat.shortDescription: Uses the last move used in the battle.

dracometeor.name: Draco Meteor
dracometeor.description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
dracometeor.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

energyball.name: Energy Ball
energyball.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
energyball.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

gunkshot.name: Gunk Shot
gunkshot.description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

gyroball.name: Gyro Ball
gyroball.description: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed) + 1, rounded down, but not more than 150. If the user's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 1.
gyroball.shortDescription: More power the slower the user than the target.

leafstorm.name: Leaf Storm
leafstorm.description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
leafstorm.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

psychoshift.name: Psycho Shift
psychoshift.description: The user's non-volatile status condition is transferred to the target, and the user is then cured. Fails if the user has no non-volatile status condition or if the target already has one.
psychoshift.shortDescription: Transfers the user's status ailment to the target.

shadowforce.name: Shadow Force
shadowforce.description: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shadowforce.shortDescription: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

wakeupslap.name: Wake-Up Slap
wakeupslap.description: Power doubles if the target is asleep. If the user has not fainted, the target wakes up.
wakeupslap.shortDescription: Power doubles if target is asleep, and wakes it.

darkvoid.name: Dark Void
darkvoid.description: Causes the target to fall asleep. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Darkrai.
darkvoid.shortDescription: Darkrai: Causes the foe(s) to fall asleep.

captivate.name: Captivate
captivate.description: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages. The target is unaffected if both the user and the target are the same gender, or if either is genderless. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability are immune.
captivate.shortDescription: Lowers the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 2 if opposite gender.

grassknot.name: Grass Knot
grassknot.description: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
grassknot.shortDescription: More power the heavier the target.

healorder.name: Heal Order
healorder.description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
healorder.shortDescription: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

heartswap.name: Heart Swap
heartswap.description: The user swaps all its stat stage changes with the target.
heartswap.shortDescription: Swaps all stat changes with target.

judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.description: This move's type depends on the user's held Plate.
judgment.shortDescription: Type varies based on the held Plate.

magnetbomb.name: Magnet Bomb
magnetbomb.description: This move does not check accuracy.
magnetbomb.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

mirrorshot.name: Mirror Shot
mirrorshot.description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mirrorshot.shortDescription: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

mudbomb.name: Mud Bomb
mudbomb.description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
mudbomb.shortDescription: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

naturalgift.name: Natural Gift
naturalgift.description: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Klutz Ability, or if Embargo or Magic Room is in effect for the user.
naturalgift.shortDescription: Power and type depends on the user's Berry.

ominouswind.name: Ominous Wind
ominouswind.description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
ominouswind.shortDescription: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.description: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.
punishment.shortDescription: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.

rockclimb.name: Rock Climb
rockclimb.description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

seedflare.name: Seed Flare
seedflare.description: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
seedflare.shortDescription: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

trumpcard.name: Trump Card
trumpcard.description: The power of this move is based on the amount of PP remaining after normal PP reduction and the Pressure Ability resolve. 200 power for 0 PP, 80 power for 1 PP, 60 power for 2 PP, 50 power for 3 PP, and 40 power for 4 or more PP.
trumpcard.shortDescription: More power the fewer PP this move has left.

roost.name: Roost
roost.description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user is not Terastallized, until the end of the turn Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
roost.shortDescription: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

attackorder.name: Attack Order
attackorder.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.description: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
avalanche.shortDescription: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

brine.name: Brine
brine.description: Power doubles if the target has less than or equal to half of its maximum HP remaining.
brine.shortDescription: Power doubles if the target's HP is 50% or less.

bugbite.name: Bug Bite
bugbite.description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
bugbite.shortDescription: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

chargebeam.name: Charge Beam
chargebeam.description: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
chargebeam.shortDescription: 70% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

closecombat.name: Close Combat
closecombat.description: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
closecombat.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

crosspoison.name: Cross Poison
crosspoison.description: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
crosspoison.shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

darkpulse.name: Dark Pulse
darkpulse.description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
darkpulse.shortDescription: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

defendorder.name: Defend Order
defendorder.description: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
defendorder.shortDescription: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

doublehit.name: Double Hit
doublehit.description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

dragonrush.name: Dragon Rush
dragonrush.description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
dragonrush.shortDescription: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

earthpower.name: Earth Power
earthpower.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
earthpower.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

firefang.name: Fire Fang
firefang.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
firefang.shortDescription: 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.

flashcannon.name: Flash Cannon
flashcannon.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
flashcannon.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

fling.name: Fling
fling.description: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Klutz Ability.
fling.shortDescription: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.

focusblast.name: Focus Blast
focusblast.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
focusblast.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

forcepalm.name: Force Palm
forcepalm.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

gastroacid.name: Gastro Acid
gastroacid.description: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, this move fails, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.

gigaimpact.name: Giga Impact

pluck.shortDescription: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

poisonjab.name: Poison Jab
poisonjab.description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

powerswap.name: Power Swap

rockwrecker.name: Rock Wrecker
rockwrecker.description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

shadowclaw.name: Shadow Claw

spacialrend.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

uturn.name: U-turn
uturn.description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
uturn.shortDescription: User switches out after damaging the target.

zenheadbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
zenheadbutt.description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
zenheadbutt.shortDescription: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

autotomize.name: Autotomize
autotomize.description: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages. If the user's Speed was changed, the user's weight is reduced by 100 kg as long as it remains active. This effect is stackable but cannot reduce the user's weight to less than 0.1 kg.
autotomize.shortDescription: Raises the user's Speed by 2; user loses 100 kg.

bestow.name: Bestow
bestow.description: The target receives the user's held item. Fails if the user has no item or is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if the target is already holding an item, if the user is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species, or if the target is one of those Pokemon and the user is holding the respective item.
bestow.shortDescription: User passes its held item to the target.

echoedvoice.name: Echoed Voice
echoedvoice.description: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
echoedvoice.shortDescription: Power increases when used on consecutive turns.

electroball.name: Electro Ball
electroball.description: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1. If the target's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 40.
electroball.shortDescription: More power the faster the user is than the target.

finalgambit.name: Final Gambit
finalgambit.description: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.
finalgambit.shortDescription: Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.

firepledge.name: Fire Pledge
firepledge.description: If one of the user's allies chose to use Grass Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances and stacks with the Serene Grace Ability, except effects that cause flinching can only have their chance doubled once. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.
firepledge.shortDescription: Use with Grass or Water Pledge for added effect.

frostbreath.name: Frost Breath
frostbreath.description: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
frostbreath.shortDescription: Always results in a critical hit.

grasspledge.name: Grass Pledge
grasspledge.description: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
grasspledge.shortDescription: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.

healpulse.name: Heal Pulse
healpulse.description: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Mega Launcher Ability, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
healpulse.shortDescription: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
hex.shortDescription: Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.

hornleech.name: Horn Leech
hornleech.description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
hornleech.shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

hurricane.name: Hurricane
hurricane.description: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
hurricane.shortDescription: 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.

incinerate.name: Incinerate
incinerate.description: The target loses its held item if it is a Berry or a Gem. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

lowsweep.name: Low Sweep
lowsweep.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
lowsweep.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

magicroom.name: Magic Room
magicroom.description: For 5 turns, the held items of all active Pokemon have no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
magicroom.shortDescription: For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.

quickguard.name: Quick Guard
quickguard.description: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
quickguard.shortDescription: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.

ragepowder.name: Rage Powder
ragepowder.description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
ragepowder.shortDescription: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

relicsong.name: Relic Song
relicsong.description: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Sheer Force Ability. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
relicsong.shortDescription: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.

round.name: Round
round.description: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user.

sacredsword.name: Sacred Sword
sacredsword.description: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.

scald.name: Scald

skydrop.name: Sky Drop
skydrop.description: This attack takes the target into the air with the user on the first turn and executes on the second. Pokemon weighing 200 kg or more cannot be lifted. On the first turn, the user and the target avoid all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. The user and the target cannot make a move between turns, but the target can select a move to use. This move cannot damage Flying-type Pokemon. Fails on the first turn if the target is an ally, if the target has a substitute, or if the target is using Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Phantom Force, Shadow Force, or Sky Drop.

stormthrow.name: Storm Throw

When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Water Gem, and cannot be redirected by the Storm Drain Ability.
waterpledge.shortDescription: Use with Grass or Fire Pledge for added effect.

wideguard.name: Wide Guard

This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. simplebeam.name: Simple Beam
simplebeam.description: Causes the target's Ability to become Simple. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Simple, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.

sludgewave.name: Sludge Wave
sludgewave.description: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

smackdown.name: Smack Down
smackdown.description: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.

storedpower.name: Stored Power
storedpower.description: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
storedpower.shortDescription: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

tailslap.name: Tail Slap
tailslap.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

venoshock.name: Venoshock
venoshock.description: Power doubles if the target is poisoned.
venoshock.shortDescription: Power doubles if the target is poisoned.

voltswitch.name: Volt Switch
voltswitch.description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
voltswitch.shortDescription: User switches out after damaging the target.

wildcharge.name: Wild Charge
wildcharge.description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

workup.name: Work Up
workup.description: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
workup.shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

diamondstorm.name: Diamond Storm
diamondstorm.description: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by 2 stages.
diamondstorm.shortDescription: 50% chance to raise user's Defense by 2.

fellstinger.name: Fell Stinger
fellstinger.description: Raises the user's Attack by 3 stages if this move knocks out the target.
fellstinger.shortDescription: Raises user's Attack by 3 if this KOes the target.

flyingpress.name: Flying Press
flyingpress.description: This move combines Flying in its type effectiveness against the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
flyingpress.shortDescription: Combines Flying in its type effectiveness.

mistyterrain.name: Misty Terrain
mistyterrain.description: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. During the effect, the power of Dragon-type attacks used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be inflicted with a non-volatile status condition nor confusion. Grounded Pokemon can become affected by Yawn but cannot fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain.
mistyterrain.shortDescription: 5 turns. Can't status,-Dragon power vs grounded.

mysticalfire.name: Mystical Fire
mysticalfire.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mysticalfire.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

paraboliccharge.name: Parabolic Charge
paraboliccharge.description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
paraboliccharge.shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

partingshot.name: Parting Shot
partingshot.description: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.
partingshot.shortDescription: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.

powder.name: Powder
powder.description: If the target uses a Fire-type move this turn, it is prevented from executing and the target loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. This effect does not happen if the Fire-type move is prevented by Primordial Sea.
powder.shortDescription: If using a Fire move, target loses 1/4 max HP.

thousandarrows.name: Thousand Arrows
thousandarrows.description: This move can hit airborne Pokemon, which includes Flying-type Pokemon, Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, Pokemon holding an Air Balloon, and Pokemon under the effect of Magnet Rise or Telekinesis. If the target is a Flying type and is not already grounded, this move deals neutral damage regardless of its other type(s). This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.
thousandarrows.shortDescription: Grounds adjacent foes. First hit neutral on Flying.

thousandwaves.name: Thousand Waves
thousandwaves.description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
thousandwaves.shortDescription: Hits adjacent foes. Prevents them from switching.

watershuriken.name: Water Shuriken
watershuriken.description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is an Ash-Greninja with the Battle Bond Ability, this move has a power of 20 and always hits three times.
watershuriken.shortDescription: Usually goes first. Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

electricterrain.name: Electric Terrain
electricterrain.description: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Grounded Pokemon cannot become affected by Yawn or fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain.

grassyterrain.name: Grassy Terrain
grassyterrain.description: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.

hyperspacefury.name: Hyperspace Fury
hyperspacefury.description: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Hoopa Unbound. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacefury.shortDescription: Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protect.

hyperspacehole.name: Hyperspace Hole
hyperspacehole.description: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
hyperspacehole.shortDescription: Breaks the target's protection for this turn.

iondeluge.name: Ion Deluge
iondeluge.description: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn. The effect happens after other effects that change a move's type.
iondeluge.shortDescription: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

kingsshield.name: King's Shield
kingsshield.description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
kingsshield.shortDescription: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Atk.

lightofruin.name: Light of Ruin
lightofruin.description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

precipiceblades.name: Precipice Blades
precipiceblades.shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

rototiller.name: Rototiller
rototiller.description: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grounded Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.
rototiller.shortDescription: Raises Atk/Sp. Atk of grounded Grass types by 1.

belch.name: Belch
belch.description: This move cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry, either by eating one that was held, stealing and eating one off another Pokemon with Bug Bite or Pluck, or eating one that was thrown at it with Fling. Once the condition is met, this move can be selected and used for the rest of the battle even if the user gains or uses another item or switches out. Consuming a Berry with Natural Gift does not count for the purposes of eating one.
belch.shortDescription: Cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry.

craftyshield.name: Crafty Shield
craftyshield.description: The user and its party members are protected from non-damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
craftyshield.shortDescription: Protects allies from Status moves this turn.

electrify.name: Electrify
electrify.description: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Among effects that can change a move's type, this effect happens last. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
electrify.shortDescription: Changes the target's move to Electric this turn.

flowershield.name: Flower Shield
flowershield.description: Raises the Defense of all active Grass-type Pokemon by 1 stage. Fails if there are no active Grass-type Pokemon.
flowershield.shortDescription: Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.

geomancy.name: Geomancy
geomancy.description: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
geomancy.shortDescription: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.

holdback.name: Hold Back
holdback.description: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
holdback.shortDescription: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

holdhands.name: Hold Hands
holdhands.description: No competitive use. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.

landswrath.name: Land's Wrath
landswrath.shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

matblock.name: Mat Block
matblock.description: The user and its party members are protected from damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field, if the user moves last this turn, or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
matblock.shortDescription: Protects allies from damaging attacks. Turn 1 only.

oblivionwing.name: Oblivion Wing
oblivionwing.description: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
oblivionwing.shortDescription: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

poweruppunch.name: Power-Up Punch
poweruppunch.description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
poweruppunch.shortDescription: 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

stickyweb.name: Sticky Web
stickyweb.description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, lowering the Speed by 1 stage of each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stickyweb.shortDescription: Lowers Speed of grounded foes by 1 on switch-in.

trickortreat.name: Trick-or-Treat
trickortreat.description: Causes the Ghost type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Ghost type. If Forest's Curse adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
trickortreat.shortDescription: Adds Ghost to the target's type(s).

venomdrench.name: Venom Drench
venomdrench.description: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 1 stage if the target is poisoned. Fails if the target is not poisoned.
venomdrench.shortDescription: Lowers Atk/Sp. Atk/Speed of poisoned foes by 1.

aromaticmist.name: Aromatic Mist
aromaticmist.description: Raises the target's Special Defense by 1 stage. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
aromaticmist.shortDescription: Raises an ally's Sp. Def by 1.

disarmingvoice.description: This move does not check accuracy.

dragonascent.name: Dragon Ascent

dragonascent.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

drainingkiss.shortDescription: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

eerieimpulse.name: Eerie Impulse
eerieimpulse.description: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages.
eerieimpulse.shortDescription: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 2.

fairylock.name: Fairy Lock
fairylock.description: Prevents all active Pokemon from switching next turn. A Pokemon can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. Fails if the effect is already active.
fairylock.shortDescription: Prevents all Pokemon from switching next turn.

forestscurse.name: Forest's Curse
forestscurse.description: Causes the Grass type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Grass type. If Trick-or-Treat adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
forestscurse.shortDescription: Adds Grass to the target's type(s).

freezedry.name: Freeze-Dry
freezedry.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
freezedry.shortDescription: 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.

infestation.name: Infestation
infestation.description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
infestation.shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

magneticflux.name: Magnetic Flux
magneticflux.description: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
magneticflux.shortDescription: Raises Def, Sp. Def of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

moonblast.name: Moonblast

petalblizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
petalblizzard.shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

playrough.shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

genesissupernova.description: If this move is successful, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain.

Camouflage transforms the user into a Psychic type, Nature Power becomes Psychic, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. purify.shortDescription: Cures target's status; heals user 1/2 max HP if so.

revelationdance.name: Revelation Dance

If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone.
revelationdance.shortDescription: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

shoreup.name: Shore Up

splinteredstormshards.name: Splintered Stormshards
