spotlight.name: Spotlight
spotlight.description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from opponents of the target are redirected to the target. Such attacks are redirected to the target before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal.
spotlight.shortDescription: Target's foes' moves are redirected to it this turn.

stokedsparksurfer.name: Stoked Sparksurfer
stokedsparksurfer.description: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

subzeroslammer.name: Subzero Slammer
subzeroslammer.description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
subzeroslammer.shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

sunsteelstrike.name: Sunsteel Strike
sunsteelstrike.description: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
sunsteelstrike.shortDescription: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

supersonicskystrike.name: Supersonic Skystrike
supersonicskystrike.description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
supersonicskystrike.shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

tectonicrage.name: Tectonic Rage
tectonicrage.description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
tectonicrage.shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

toxicthread.name: Toxic Thread
toxicthread.description: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage and poisons it.
toxicthread.shortDescription: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 and poisons it.

twinkletackle.name: Twinkle Tackle
twinkletackle.description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
twinkletackle.shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

anchorshot.name: Anchor Shot
anchorshot.description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
anchorshot.shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

auroraveil.name: Aurora Veil
auroraveil.description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical and special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle; does not reduce damage further with Reflect or Light Screen. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Brick Break and Psychic Fangs remove the effect before damage is calculated. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails unless the weather is Snow.
auroraveil.shortDescription: For 5 turns, damage to allies halved. Snow only.

burnup.name: Burn Up
burnup.description: Fails unless the user is a Fire type. If this move is successful and the user is not Terastallized, the user's Fire type becomes typeless as long as it remains active.
burnup.shortDescription: User's Fire type becomes typeless; must be Fire.

coreenforcer.name: Core Enforcer
coreenforcer.description: If the user moves after the target, the target's Ability is rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, this effect does not happen, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.
coreenforcer.shortDescription: Nullifies the foe(s) Ability if the foe(s) move first.

gearup.name: Gear Up
gearup.description: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
gearup.shortDescription: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

laserfocus.name: Laser Focus
laserfocus.description: Until the end of the next turn, the user's attacks will be critical hits.
laserfocus.shortDescription: Until the end of the next turn, user's moves crit.

mindblown.name: Mind Blown
mindblown.description: Whether or not this move is successful and even if it would cause fainting, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability. This move is prevented from executing and the user does not lose HP if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability, or if this move is Fire type and the user is affected by Powder or the weather is Primordial Sea.
mindblown.shortDescription: User loses 50% max HP. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

plasmafists.name: Plasma Fists
plasmafists.description: If this move is successful, causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
plasmafists.shortDescription: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

shadowbone.name: Shadow Bone
shadowbone.description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shadowbone.shortDescription: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

shelltrap.name: Shell Trap
shelltrap.description: Fails unless the user is hit by a physical attack from an opponent this turn before it can execute the move. If the user was hit and has not fainted, it attacks immediately after being hit, and the effect ends. If the opponent's physical attack had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability, it does not count for the purposes of this effect.
shelltrap.shortDescription: User must take physical damage before moving.

spectralthief.name: Spectral Thief
spectralthief.description: The target's stat stages greater than 0 are stolen from it and applied to the user before dealing damage.
spectralthief.shortDescription: Steals target's boosts before dealing damage.

banefulbunker.name: Baneful Bunker
banefulbunker.description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user become poisoned. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

brutalswing.name: Brutal Swing
brutalswing.shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

clangingscales.name: Clanging Scales
clangingscales.description: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage.

darkestlariat.name: Darkest Lariat
darkestlariat.description: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
darkestlariat.shortDescription: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

firelash.name: Fire Lash
firelash.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
firelash.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

firstimpression.name: First Impression
firstimpression.description: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
firstimpression.shortDescription: Nearly always goes first. First turn out only.

fleurcannon.name: Fleur Cannon
fleurcannon.description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
fleurcannon.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

instruct.name: Instruct
instruct.description: The target immediately uses its last used move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, if the target is preparing to use Beak Blast, Focus Punch, or Shell Trap, or if the move is Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Ice Ball, Instruct, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Obstruct, Outrage, Petal Dance, Rollout, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Thrash, Transform, Uproar, Wicked Torque, any two-turn move, or any recharge move.
instruct.shortDescription: The target immediately uses its last used move.

liquidation.name: Liquidation
liquidation.description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
liquidation.shortDescription: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
lunge.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

photongeyser.name: Photon Geyser
photongeyser.description: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
photongeyser.shortDescription: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.

powertrip.name: Power Trip
powertrip.description: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
powertrip.shortDescription: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

prismaticlaser.name: Prismatic Laser
prismaticlaser.description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

psychicfangs.name: Psychic Fangs
psychicfangs.description: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
psychicfangs.shortDescription: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

smartstrike.name: Smart Strike
smartstrike.description: This move does not check accuracy.
smartstrike.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

solarblade.name: Solar Blade
solarblade.description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
solarblade.shortDescription: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

sparklingaria.name: Sparkling Aria
sparklingaria.description: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn.
sparklingaria.shortDescription: The target is cured of its burn.

speedswap.name: Speed Swap
speedswap.description: The user swaps its Speed stat with the target. Stat stage changes are unaffected.

spiritshackle.name: Spirit Shackle
spiritshackle.description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
spiritshackle.shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

stompingtantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
stompingtantrum.description: Power doubles if the user's last move on the previous turn, including moves called by other moves or those used through Instruct, Magic Coat, Snatch, or the Dancer or Magic Bounce Abilities, failed to do any of its normal effects, not including damage from an unsuccessful High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, or Mind Blown, or if the user was prevented from moving by any effect other than recharging or Sky Drop. A move that was blocked by Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, Spiky Shield, Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard will not double this move's power, nor will Bounce or Fly ending early due to the effect of Gravity, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
stompingtantrum.shortDescription: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

strengthsap.name: Strength Sap
strengthsap.description: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat calculated with its stat stage before this move was used. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Fails if the target's Attack stat stage is -6.
strengthsap.shortDescription: User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.

tearfullook.name: Tearful Look
tearfullook.description: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
tearfullook.shortDescription: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

throatchop.name: Throat Chop
throatchop.description: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound-based moves.
throatchop.shortDescription: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound moves.

tropkick.name: Trop Kick
tropkick.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
tropkick.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

zingzap.name: Zing Zap
zingzap.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
zingzap.shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

boltbeak.name: Bolt Beak
boltbeak.description: Power doubles if the user moves before the target.
boltbeak.shortDescription: Power doubles if user moves before the target.

corrosivegas.name: Corrosive Gas
corrosivegas.description: The target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

doubleironbash.name: Double Iron Bash
doubleironbash.description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
doubleironbash.shortDescription: Hits twice. 30% chance to make the target flinch.

eternabeam.name: Eternabeam
eternabeam.description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

fishiousrend.name: Fishious Rend
fishiousrend.description: Power doubles if the user moves before the target.
fishiousrend.shortDescription: Power doubles if user moves before the target.

glaciallance.name: Glacial Lance
glaciallance.shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

grassyglide.name: Grassy Glide
grassyglide.description: If the current terrain is Grassy Terrain and the user is grounded, this move has its priority increased by 1.

maxairstream.name: Max Airstream
maxairstream.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxairstream.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Speed.

maxdarkness.name: Max Darkness
maxdarkness.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Defense of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxdarkness.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Def.

maxflare.name: Max Flare
maxflare.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Sunny Day begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxflare.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Starts Sunny Day.

maxflutterby.name: Max Flutterby
maxflutterby.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Attack of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxflutterby.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Atk.

maxgeyser.name: Max Geyser
maxgeyser.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Rain Dance begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxgeyser.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Starts Rain Dance.

maxguard.name: Max Guard
maxguard.description: The user is protected from nearly all attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, including Max and G-Max Moves. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
maxguard.shortDescription: Protects user from moves & Max Moves this turn.

maxhailstorm.name: Max Hailstorm
maxhailstorm.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Hail begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxhailstorm.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Starts Hail.

maxknuckle.name: Max Knuckle
maxknuckle.description: Boosts the user and its allies' Attack by 1 stage. BP scales with the base move's BP. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxknuckle.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Attack.

maxlightning.name: Max Lightning
maxlightning.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Electric Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxlightning.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Starts Electric Terrain.

maxmindstorm.name: Max Mindstorm
maxmindstorm.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Psychic Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxmindstorm.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Starts Psychic Terrain.

maxooze.name: Max Ooze
maxooze.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Attack of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxooze.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Atk.

maxovergrowth.name: Max Overgrowth
maxovergrowth.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Grassy Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxovergrowth.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Starts Grassy Terrain.

maxphantasm.name: Max Phantasm
maxphantasm.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Defense of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxphantasm.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Defense.

maxquake.name: Max Quake
maxquake.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Defense of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxquake.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Def.

maxrockfall.name: Max Rockfall
maxrockfall.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Sandstorm begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxrockfall.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Starts Sandstorm.

maxstarfall.name: Max Starfall
maxstarfall.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Misty Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxstarfall.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Starts Misty Terrain.

maxsteelspike.name: Max Steelspike
maxsteelspike.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Defense of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxsteelspike.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Defense.

maxstrike.name: Max Strike
maxstrike.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxstrike.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Speed.

maxwyrmwind.name: Max Wyrmwind
maxwyrmwind.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Attack of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
maxwyrmwind.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Attack.

meteorassault.name: Meteor Assault
meteorassault.description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.

obstruct.name: Obstruct
obstruct.description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Defense lowered by 2 stages. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
obstruct.shortDescription: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -2 Def.

octolock.name: Octolock
octolock.description: Prevents the target from switching out. At the end of each turn during effect, the target's Defense and Special Defense are lowered by 1 stage. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
octolock.shortDescription: Traps target, lowers Def and SpD by 1 each turn.

snaptrap.name: Snap Trap
snaptrap.description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
snaptrap.shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

wickedblow.name: Wicked Blow
wickedblow.description: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
wickedblow.shortDescription: Always results in a critical hit.

appleacid.name: Apple Acid
appleacid.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
appleacid.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

astralbarrage.name: Astral Barrage
astralbarrage.shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

aurawheel.name: Aura Wheel
aurawheel.description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage. If the user is a Morpeko in Full Belly Mode, this move is Electric type. If the user is a Morpeko in Hangry Mode, this move is Dark type. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Full Belly or Hangry Mode Morpeko.

bodypress.name: Body Press
bodypress.description: Damage is calculated using the user's Defense stat as its Attack, including stat stage changes. Other effects that modify the Attack stat are used as normal.
bodypress.shortDescription: Uses user's Def stat as Atk in damage calculation.

breakingswipe.name: Breaking Swipe
breakingswipe.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
breakingswipe.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Attack by 1.

burningjealousy.name: Burning Jealousy
burningjealousy.description: Has a 100% chance to burn the target if it had a stat stage raised this turn.
burningjealousy.shortDescription: 100% burns a target that had a stat rise this turn.

clangoroussoul.name: Clangorous Soul
clangoroussoul.description: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage in exchange for the user losing 33% of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed stat stages would not change.
clangoroussoul.shortDescription: User loses 33% of its max HP. +1 to all stats.

coaching.name: Coaching
coaching.description: Raises the target's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
coaching.shortDescription: Raises an ally's Attack and Defense by 1.

courtchange.name: Court Change
courtchange.description: Switches the Mist, Light Screen, Reflect, Spikes, Safeguard, Tailwind, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, Water Pledge, Fire Pledge, Grass Pledge, Sticky Web, Aurora Veil, G-Max Steelsurge, G-Max Cannonade, G-Max Vine Lash, and G-Max Wildfire effects from the user's side to the opposing side and vice versa.
courtchange.shortDescription: Swaps user's field effects with the opposing side.

decorate.name: Decorate
decorate.description: Raises the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages.
decorate.shortDescription: Raises the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 2.

dragondarts.name: Dragon Darts
dragondarts.description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. In Double Battles, this move attempts to hit the targeted Pokemon and its ally once each. If hitting one of these Pokemon would be prevented by immunity, protection, semi-invulnerability, an Ability, or accuracy, it attempts to hit the other Pokemon twice instead. If this move is redirected, it hits that target twice.
dragondarts.shortDescription: Hits twice. Doubles: Tries to hit each foe once.

dragonenergy.name: Dragon Energy
dragonenergy.description: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
dragonenergy.shortDescription: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

drumbeating.name: Drum Beating
drumbeating.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
drumbeating.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

dualwingbeat.name: Dual Wingbeat
dualwingbeat.description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

eeriespell.name: Eerie Spell
eeriespell.description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the target loses 3 PP from its last move.
eeriespell.shortDescription: Removes 3 PP from the target's last move.

expandingforce.name: Expanding Force
expandingforce.description: If the current terrain is Psychic Terrain and the user is grounded, this move hits all opposing Pokemon and has its power multiplied by 1.5.
expandingforce.shortDescription: User on Psychic Terrain: 1.5x power, hits foes.

falsesurrender.name: False Surrender
falsesurrender.description: This move does not check accuracy.
falsesurrender.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

fierywrath.name: Fiery Wrath
fierywrath.description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
fierywrath.shortDescription: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

flipturn.name: Flip Turn
flipturn.description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
flipturn.shortDescription: User switches out after damaging the target.

freezingglare.name: Freezing Glare
freezingglare.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

gmaxbefuddle.name: G-Max Befuddle
gmaxbefuddle.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side either falls asleep, becomes poisoned, or becomes paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxbefuddle.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: slp or psn or par.

gmaxcannonade.name: G-Max Cannonade
gmaxcannonade.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Water-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
gmaxcannonade.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

gmaxcentiferno.name: G-Max Centiferno
gmaxcentiferno.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw), even if they have a substitute. Causes damage equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends for a target if it leaves the field, or if it uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
gmaxcentiferno.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.

gmaxchistrike.name: G-Max Chi Strike
gmaxchistrike.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side has their critical hit ratio raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxchistrike.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: Crit Ratio +1.

gmaxcuddle.name: G-Max Cuddle
gmaxcuddle.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes infatuated, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen for a target if both it and the user are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated.
gmaxcuddle.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: infatuated.

gmaxdepletion.name: G-Max Depletion
gmaxdepletion.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side loses 2 PP from its last move used, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxdepletion.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: last move -2 PP.

gmaxdrumsolo.name: G-Max Drum Solo
gmaxdrumsolo.description: Power is 160 regardless of the base move's Max Move power. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

gmaxfinale.name: G-Max Finale
gmaxfinale.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/6 of its current maximum HP, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxfinale.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: +1/6 max HP.

gmaxfireball.name: G-Max Fireball
gmaxfireball.description: Power is 160 regardless of the base move's Max Move power. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

gmaxfoamburst.name: G-Max Foam Burst
gmaxfoamburst.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 2 stages, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxfoamburst.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -2 Speed.

gmaxgoldrush.name: G-Max Gold Rush
gmaxgoldrush.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes confused, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxgoldrush.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: confused.

gmaxgravitas.name: G-Max Gravitas
gmaxgravitas.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Gravity begins.
gmaxgravitas.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Starts Gravity.

gmaxhydrosnipe.name: G-Max Hydrosnipe
gmaxhydrosnipe.description: Power is 160 regardless of the base move's Max Move power. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

gmaxmalodor.name: G-Max Malodor
gmaxmalodor.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes poisoned, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxmalodor.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: poisoned.

gmaxmeltdown.name: G-Max Meltdown
gmaxmeltdown.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Torment begins for each Pokemon on the opposing side, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxmeltdown.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: Tormented.

gmaxoneblow.name: G-Max One Blow
gmaxoneblow.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. This move bypasses all protection effects, including Max Guard.
gmaxoneblow.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Bypasses Max Guard.

gmaxrapidflow.name: G-Max Rapid Flow
gmaxrapidflow.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. This move bypasses all protection effects, including Max Guard.
gmaxrapidflow.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Bypasses Max Guard.

gmaxreplenish.name: G-Max Replenish
gmaxreplenish.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, there is a 50% chance every Pokemon on the user's side has its Berry restored, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxreplenish.shortDescription: Base move affects power. 50% restores Berries.

gmaxresonance.name: G-Max Resonance
gmaxresonance.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Aurora Veil begins on the user's side.
gmaxresonance.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: Aurora Veil.

gmaxsandblast.name: G-Max Sandblast
gmaxsandblast.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw), even if they have a substitute. Causes damage equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends for a target if it leaves the field, or if it uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
gmaxsandblast.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.

gmaxsmite.name: G-Max Smite
gmaxsmite.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes confused, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxsmite.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: confused.

gmaxsnooze.name: G-Max Snooze
gmaxsnooze.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, there is a 50% chance the effect of Yawn begins on the target, even if it has a substitute.
gmaxsnooze.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Target: 50% Yawn.

gmaxsteelsurge.name: G-Max Steelsurge
gmaxsteelsurge.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Steel type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
gmaxsteelsurge.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: Steel hazard.

gmaxstonesurge.name: G-Max Stonesurge
gmaxstonesurge.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
gmaxstonesurge.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: Stealth Rock.

gmaxstunshock.name: G-Max Stun Shock
gmaxstunshock.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side either becomes poisoned or paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxstunshock.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: psn or par.

gmaxsweetness.name: G-Max Sweetness
gmaxsweetness.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side has its status condition cured, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxsweetness.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: status cured.

gmaxtartness.name: G-Max Tartness
gmaxtartness.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the evasiveness of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxtartness.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 evasiveness.

gmaxterror.name: G-Max Terror
gmaxterror.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching out, even if they have a substitute. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If a target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
gmaxterror.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: trapped.

gmaxvinelash.name: G-Max Vine Lash
gmaxvinelash.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Grass-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
gmaxvinelash.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

gmaxvolcalith.name: G-Max Volcalith
gmaxvolcalith.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Rock-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
gmaxvolcalith.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

gmaxvoltcrash.name: G-Max Volt Crash
gmaxvoltcrash.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
gmaxvoltcrash.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: paralyzed.

gmaxwildfire.name: G-Max Wildfire
gmaxwildfire.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Fire-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
gmaxwildfire.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

gmaxwindrage.name: G-Max Wind Rage
gmaxwindrage.description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain end, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, G-Max Steelsurge, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of G-Max Steelsurge, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side.
gmaxwindrage.shortDescription: Base move affects power. Ends Terrain, hazards.

gravapple.name: Grav Apple
gravapple.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Power is multiplied by 1.5 during Gravity's effect.

jawlock.name: Jaw Lock
jawlock.description: Prevents the user and the target from switching out. The user and the target can still switch out if either of them is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.
jawlock.shortDescription: Prevents both user and target from switching out.

junglehealing.name: Jungle Healing
junglehealing.description: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
junglehealing.shortDescription: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

lashout.name: Lash Out
lashout.description: Power doubles if the user had a stat stage lowered this turn.
lashout.shortDescription: 2x power if the user had a stat lowered this turn.

lifedew.name: Life Dew
lifedew.description: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
lifedew.shortDescription: Heals the user and its allies by 1/4 their max HP.

magicpowder.name: Magic Powder
magicpowder.description: Causes the target to become a Psychic type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the target is already purely Psychic type, or if the target is Terastallized.
magicpowder.shortDescription: Changes the target's type to Psychic.

meteorbeam.name: Meteor Beam
meteorbeam.description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
meteorbeam.shortDescription: Raises user's Sp. Atk by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

mistyexplosion.name: Misty Explosion
mistyexplosion.description: If the current terrain is Misty Terrain and the user is grounded, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
mistyexplosion.shortDescription: User faints. User on Misty Terrain: 1.5x power.

noretreat.name: No Retreat
noretreat.description: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage, but it becomes prevented from switching out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. Fails if the user has already been prevented from switching by this effect.
noretreat.shortDescription: Raises all stats by 1 (not acc/eva). Traps user.

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
poltergeist.description: Fails if the target has no held item.
poltergeist.shortDescription: Fails if the target has no held item.

pyroball.name: Pyro Ball
pyroball.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
pyroball.shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

risingvoltage.name: Rising Voltage
risingvoltage.description: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain and the target is grounded, this move's power is doubled.
risingvoltage.shortDescription: 2x power if target is grounded in Electric Terrain.

scaleshot.name: Scale Shot
scaleshot.description: Hits two to five times. Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage and raises the user's Speed by 1 stage after the last hit. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
scaleshot.shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times. User: -1 Def, +1 Spe after last hit.

scorchingsands.name: Scorching Sands
scorchingsands.description: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
scorchingsands.shortDescription: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

shellsidearm.name: Shell Side Arm
shellsidearm.description: Has a 20% chance to poison the target. This move becomes a physical attack that makes contact if the value of ((((2 * the user's level / 5 + 2) * 90 * X) / Y) / 50), where X is the user's Attack stat and Y is the target's Defense stat, is greater than the same value where X is the user's Special Attack stat and Y is the target's Special Defense stat. No stat modifiers other than stat stage changes are considered for this purpose. If the two values are equal, this move chooses a damage category at random.
shellsidearm.shortDescription: 20% psn. Physical+contact if it would be stronger.

skittersmack.name: Skitter Smack
skittersmack.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
skittersmack.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower target's Sp. Atk by 1.

snipeshot.name: Snipe Shot
snipeshot.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This move cannot be redirected to a different target by any effect.
snipeshot.shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. Cannot be redirected.

spiritbreak.name: Spirit Break
spiritbreak.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
spiritbreak.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

steelbeam.name: Steel Beam
steelbeam.description: Whether or not this move is successful and even if it would cause fainting, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability.

steelroller.name: Steel Roller
steelroller.description: Fails if there is no terrain active. Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.
steelroller.shortDescription: Fails if there is no terrain active. Ends the terrain.

strangesteam.name: Strange Steam
strangesteam.description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

stuffcheeks.name: Stuff Cheeks
stuffcheeks.description: This move cannot be selected unless the user is holding a Berry. The user eats its Berry and raises its Defense by 2 stages. This effect is not prevented by the Klutz or Unnerve Abilities, or the effects of Embargo or Magic Room. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry.
stuffcheeks.shortDescription: Must hold Berry to use. User eats Berry, Def +2.

surgingstrikes.name: Surging Strikes
surgingstrikes.description: Hits three times. This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
surgingstrikes.shortDescription: Always results in a critical hit. Hits 3 times.

tarshot.name: Tar Shot
tarshot.description: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage. Until the target switches out, the effectiveness of Fire-type moves is doubled against it.
tarshot.shortDescription: Target gets -1 Spe and becomes weaker to Fire.

teatime.name: Teatime
teatime.description: All active Pokemon consume their held Berries. This effect is not prevented by substitutes, the Klutz or Unnerve Abilities, or the effects of Embargo or Magic Room. Fails if no active Pokemon is holding a Berry.
teatime.shortDescription: All active Pokemon consume held Berries.

terrainpulse.name: Terrain Pulse
terrainpulse.description: Power doubles if the user is grounded and a terrain is active, and this move's type changes to match. Electric type during Electric Terrain, Grass type during Grassy Terrain, Fairy type during Misty Terrain, and Psychic type during Psychic Terrain.
terrainpulse.shortDescription: User on terrain: power doubles, type varies.

thundercage.name: Thunder Cage
thundercage.description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
thundercage.shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

thunderouskick.name: Thunderous Kick
thunderouskick.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
thunderouskick.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

tripleaxel.name: Triple Axel
tripleaxel.description: Hits three times. Power increases to 40 for the second hit and 60 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit three times.
tripleaxel.shortDescription: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

alluringvoice.name: Alluring Voice
alluringvoice.description: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target if it had a stat stage raised this turn.
alluringvoice.shortDescription: 100% confuse target that had a stat rise this turn.

aquacutter.name: Aqua Cutter
aquacutter.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

aquastep.name: Aqua Step
aquastep.description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
aquastep.shortDescription: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

armorcannon.name: Armor Cannon
armorcannon.description: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
armorcannon.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

axekick.name: Axe Kick
axekick.description: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
axekick.shortDescription: 30% confusion. User loses 50% max HP if miss.

barbbarrage.name: Barb Barrage
barbbarrage.description: Has a 50% chance to poison the target. Power doubles if the target is already poisoned.
barbbarrage.shortDescription: 50% psn. 2x power if target already poisoned.

bitterblade.name: Bitter Blade
bitterblade.description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
bitterblade.shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

bittermalice.name: Bitter Malice
bittermalice.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
bittermalice.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

blazingtorque.name: Blazing Torque
blazingtorque.description: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

bleakwindstorm.name: Bleakwind Storm
bleakwindstorm.description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 80%.
bleakwindstorm.shortDescription: 30% to lower foe(s) Speed by 1. Rain: can't miss.

bloodmoon.name: Blood Moon
bloodmoon.description: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.
bloodmoon.shortDescription: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.

burningbulwark.name: Burning Bulwark
burningbulwark.description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user become burned. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
burningbulwark.shortDescription: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: burn.

ceaselessedge.name: Ceaseless Edge
ceaselessedge.description: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. A maximum of three layers may be set, and opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
ceaselessedge.shortDescription: Sets a layer of Spikes on the opposing side.

chillingwater.name: Chilling Water
chillingwater.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
chillingwater.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

chillyreception.name: Chilly Reception
chillyreception.description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. The user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.

chloroblast.name: Chloroblast
chloroblast.description: If this move is successful, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability.

collisioncourse.name: Collision Course
collisioncourse.description: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.

combattorque.name: Combat Torque
combattorque.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

comeuppance.name: Comeuppance
comeuppance.description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
comeuppance.shortDescription: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

direclaw.name: Dire Claw
direclaw.description: Has a 50% chance to cause the target to either fall asleep, become poisoned, or become paralyzed.
direclaw.shortDescription: 50% chance to sleep, poison, or paralyze target.

doodle.name: Doodle
doodle.description: The user and its ally's Abilities change to match the target's Ability. Does not change Ability if the user's or its ally's is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target. Fails if both the user and its ally's Ability already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Flower Gift, Forecast, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
doodle.shortDescription: User and ally's Abilities become target's Ability.

doubleshock.name: Double Shock
doubleshock.description: Fails unless the user is an Electric type. If this move is successful and the user is not Terastallized, the user's Electric type becomes typeless as long as it remains active.
doubleshock.shortDescription: User's Electric type: typeless; must be Electric.

dragoncheer.name: Dragon Cheer
dragoncheer.description: Raises the target's chance for a critical hit by 1 stage, or by 2 stages if the target is Dragon type. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user, or if the target already has this effect or the Focus Energy effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
dragoncheer.shortDescription: Ally: Crit ratio +1, or +2 if ally is Dragon type.

electrodrift.name: Electro Drift
electrodrift.description: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.

electroshot.name: Electro Shot
electroshot.description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, the move still requires a turn to charge.
electroshot.shortDescription: Raises Sp. Atk by 1, hits turn 2. Rain: no charge.

esperwing.name: Esper Wing
esperwing.description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage and a higher chance for a critical hit.
esperwing.shortDescription: 100% chance to raise user Speed by 1. High crit.

ficklebeam.name: Fickle Beam
ficklebeam.description: Has a 30% chance this move's power is doubled.
ficklebeam.shortDescription: Has a 30% chance this move's power is doubled.

filletaway.name: Fillet Away
filletaway.description: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed stat stages would not change.
filletaway.shortDescription: +2 Attack, Sp. Atk, Speed for 1/2 user's max HP.

flowertrick.name: Flower Trick
flowertrick.description: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities. This move does not check accuracy.
flowertrick.shortDescription: Always results in a critical hit; no accuracy check.

gigatonhammer.name: Gigaton Hammer
gigatonhammer.description: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.
gigatonhammer.shortDescription: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.

glaiverush.name: Glaive Rush
glaiverush.description: If this move is successful, moves targeted at the user deal double damage and do not check accuracy until the user's next turn.
glaiverush.shortDescription: User takes sure-hit 2x damage until its next turn.

hardpress.name: Hard Press
hardpress.description: Power is equal to 100 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
hardpress.shortDescription: More power the more HP the target has left.

headlongrush.name: Headlong Rush
headlongrush.description: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
headlongrush.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

hydrosteam.name: Hydro Steam
hydrosteam.description: If the current weather is Sunny Day and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella, this move's damage is multiplied by 1.5 instead of halved for being Water type.
hydrosteam.shortDescription: During Sunny Day: 1.5x damage instead of half.

icespinner.name: Ice Spinner
icespinner.description: Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.

infernalparade.name: Infernal Parade
infernalparade.description: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
infernalparade.shortDescription: 30% burn. 2x power if target is already statused.

ivycudgel.name: Ivy Cudgel
ivycudgel.description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. If the user is an Ogerpon holding a mask, this move's type changes to match. Water type for Wellspring Mask, Fire type for Hearthflame Mask, and Rock type for Cornerstone Mask.
ivycudgel.shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. Type depends on user's form.

kowtowcleave.name: Kowtow Cleave
kowtowcleave.description: This move does not check accuracy.
kowtowcleave.shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

lastrespects.name: Last Respects
lastrespects.description: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times any Pokemon has fainted on the user's side, and X cannot be greater than 100.
lastrespects.shortDescription: +50 power for each time a party member fainted.

luminacrash.name: Lumina Crash
luminacrash.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
luminacrash.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

lunarblessing.name: Lunar Blessing
lunarblessing.description: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
lunarblessing.shortDescription: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

magicaltorque.name: Magical Torque
magicaltorque.description: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

makeitrain.name: Make It Rain
makeitrain.description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
makeitrain.shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 1. Hits foe(s).

malignantchain.name: Malignant Chain
malignantchain.description: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
malignantchain.shortDescription: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

matchagotcha.name: Matcha Gotcha
matchagotcha.description: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
matchagotcha.shortDescription: 20% burn. Recovers 50% dmg dealt. Thaws foe(s).

mortalspin.name: Mortal Spin
mortalspin.description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to poison the target.
mortalspin.shortDescription: Poisons foes, frees user from hazards/bind/leech.

mountaingale.name: Mountain Gale
mountaingale.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
mountaingale.shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

mysticalpower.name: Mystical Power
mysticalpower.description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
mysticalpower.shortDescription: 100% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

noxioustorque.name: Noxious Torque
noxioustorque.description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

orderup.name: Order Up
orderup.description: If an ally Tatsugiri has activated its Commander Ability, this move raises the user's Attack by 1 stage if the Tatsugiri is Curly Form, Defense by 1 stage if Droopy Form, or Speed by 1 stage if Stretchy Form. The effect happens whether or not this move is successful, and even if the Tatsugiri that activated the effect has since fainted.

populationbomb.name: Population Bomb
populationbomb.description: Hits ten times. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit ten times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move hits four to ten times at random without checking accuracy between hits.
populationbomb.shortDescription: Hits 10 times. Each hit can miss.

pounce.name: Pounce
pounce.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
pounce.shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

powershift.name: Power Shift
powershift.description: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
powershift.shortDescription: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

psyblade.name: Psyblade
psyblade.description: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5.

psychicnoise.name: Psychic Noise
psychicnoise.description: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
psychicnoise.shortDescription: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from healing.

psyshieldbash.name: Psyshield Bash
psyshieldbash.description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
psyshieldbash.shortDescription: 100% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

ragefist.name: Rage Fist
ragefist.description: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times the user has been hit by a damaging attack during the battle, even if the user did not lose HP from the attack. X cannot be greater than 6 and does not reset upon switching out or fainting. Each hit of a multi-hit attack is counted, but confusion damage is not counted.
ragefist.shortDescription: +50 power for each time user was hit. Max 6 hits.

ragingbull.name: Raging Bull
ragingbull.description: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated. If the user's current form is a Paldean Tauros, this move's type changes to match. Fighting type for Combat Breed, Fire type for Blaze Breed, and Water type for Aqua Breed.
ragingbull.shortDescription: Destroys screens. Type depends on user's form.

ragingfury.name: Raging Fury
ragingfury.description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
ragingfury.shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

revivalblessing.name: Revival Blessing
revivalblessing.description: A fainted party member is selected and revived with 1/2 its max HP, rounded down. Fails if there are no fainted party members.
revivalblessing.shortDescription: Revives a fainted Pokemon to 50% HP.

ruination.name: Ruination
ruination.description: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
ruination.shortDescription: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

saltcure.name: Salt Cure
saltcure.description: Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/4 if the target is Steel or Water type), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
saltcure.shortDescription: Deals 1/8 max HP each turn; 1/4 on Steel, Water.

sandsearstorm.name: Sandsear Storm
sandsearstorm.description: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 80%.
sandsearstorm.shortDescription: 20% chance to burn foe(s). Can't miss in rain.

shedtail.name: Shed Tail
shedtail.description: The user takes 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, and creates a substitute that has 1/4 of the user's maximum HP, rounded down. The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party and the selected Pokemon has the substitute transferred to it. Fails if the user would faint, or if there are no unfainted party members.
shedtail.shortDescription: User takes 1/2 its max HP to pass a substitute.

shelter.name: Shelter
shelter.description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

silktrap.name: Silk Trap
silktrap.description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Speed lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
silktrap.shortDescription: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Spe.

snowscape.name: Snowscape
snowscape.description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. During the effect, the Defense of Ice-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a physical attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Snow.
snowscape.shortDescription: For 5 turns, snow falls. Ice: 1.5x Def.

spicyextract.name: Spicy Extract
spicyextract.description: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and lowers its Defense by 2 stages.
spicyextract.shortDescription: Raises target's Atk by 2 and lowers its Def by 2.

spinout.name: Spin Out
spinout.description: Lowers the user's Speed by 2 stages.

springtidestorm.name: Springtide Storm
springtidestorm.description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
springtidestorm.shortDescription: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) Attack by 1.

stoneaxe.name: Stone Axe
stoneaxe.description: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
stoneaxe.shortDescription: Sets Stealth Rock on the target's side.

supercellslam.name: Supercell Slam
supercellslam.description: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
supercellslam.shortDescription: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

syrupbomb.name: Syrup Bomb
syrupbomb.description: If this move is successful, it causes the target's Speed to be lowered by 1 stage at the end of each turn for 3 turns.
syrupbomb.shortDescription: Target's Speed is lowered by 1 stage for 3 turns.

tachyoncutter.name: Tachyon Cutter
tachyoncutter.description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. This move does not check accuracy.
tachyoncutter.shortDescription: Hits twice. This move does not check accuracy.

takeheart.name: Take Heart
takeheart.description: The user cures its non-volatile status condition. Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
takeheart.shortDescription: Cures user's status, raises Sp. Atk, Sp. Def by 1.

temperflare.name: Temper Flare
temperflare.description: Power doubles if the user's last move on the previous turn, including moves called by other moves or those used through Instruct, Magic Coat, Snatch, or the Dancer or Magic Bounce Abilities, failed to do any of its normal effects, not including damage from an unsuccessful High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, or Mind Blown, or if the user was prevented from moving by any effect other than recharging or Sky Drop. A move that was blocked by Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, Spiky Shield, Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard will not double this move's power, nor will Bounce or Fly ending early due to the effect of Gravity, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
temperflare.shortDescription: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

terablast.name: Tera Blast
terablast.description: If the user is Terastallized, this move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes, and this move's type becomes the same as the user's Tera Type. In addition, if the user's Tera Type is Stellar, this move has 100 power, is super effective against Terastallized targets and neutral against other targets, and lowers the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
terablast.shortDescription: If Terastallized: Phys. if Atk > SpA, type = Tera.

terastarstorm.name: Tera Starstorm
terastarstorm.description: If the user is a Terapagos in Stellar Form, this move's type becomes Stellar, hits all opposing Pokemon, and becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes.
terastarstorm.shortDescription: Terapagos-Stellar: Stellar type, hits both foes.

thunderclap.name: Thunderclap
thunderclap.description: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
thunderclap.shortDescription: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

tidyup.name: Tidy Up
tidyup.description: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage. Removes subtitutes from all active Pokemon and ends the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes for both sides.
tidyup.shortDescription: User +1 Atk, Spe. Clears all substitutes/hazards.

torchsong.name: Torch Song
torchsong.description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
torchsong.shortDescription: 100% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

trailblaze.name: Trailblaze
trailblaze.description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
trailblaze.shortDescription: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

triplearrows.name: Triple Arrows
triplearrows.description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage, a 30% chance to make it flinch, and a higher chance for a critical hit.

twinbeam.name: Twin Beam
twinbeam.description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

upperhand.name: Upper Hand
upperhand.description: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails if the target did not select a priority move for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
upperhand.shortDescription: 100% flinch. Fails unless target using priority.

victorydance.name: Victory Dance
victorydance.description: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
victorydance.shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Speed by 1.

wavecrash.name: Wave Crash
wavecrash.description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

wickedtorque.name: Wicked Torque
wickedtorque.description: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep.
wickedtorque.shortDescription: 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep.

wildboltstorm.name: Wildbolt Storm
wildboltstorm.description: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 80%.
wildboltstorm.shortDescription: 20% chance to paralyze foe(s). Rain: can't miss.
